trans-unit.source: Both returs a tuple with Windows Virual-Key code (with some additions) and key state code.
trans-unit.target: Both returs a tuple with Windows Virual-Key code (with some additions) and key state code.

trans-unit.source: I know that there are others Python packages similar to this on the web, but i make this because my main goal would be to create an easy-to-use and fast-response keyboard input event hook package that can be adapted to different types of use.
trans-unit.target: I know that there are others Python packages similar to this on the web, but i make this because my main goal would be to create an easy-to-use and fast-response keyboard input event hook package that can be adapted to different types of use.

trans-unit.source: I’ve tried to use the same interface in both modules classes to achieve an easy interpretation of what they do, even if “under the hood” is used a different code implementation.
trans-unit.target: I’ve tried to use the same interface in both modules classes to achieve an easy interpretation of what they do, even if “under the hood” is used a different code implementation.

trans-unit.source: Simple keyboard input hook on multiple platforms that returns a character.
trans-unit.target: 在多个平台上简单的键盘输入钩,返回一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The classes directly included in the above modules are the only ones that you can use for input purposes.
trans-unit.target: 以上模块中直接包含的类,是唯一可以用于输入目的的类。

trans-unit.source: The main modules are **ksSys.py** and **ksApp.py**.
trans-unit.target: The main modules are **ksSys.py** and **ksApp.py**.
